# Machine Time (machinetime.xyz)

Machine Time is a philosophical nonfiction work presented as 119 blocks.

Canonical human-readable pages:
- Index: https://machinetime.xyz/index/
- Block pages: https://machinetime.xyz/block/{n}/

LLM/agent-friendly plain text endpoints:
- Raw text: https://machinetime.xyz/raw/{n}.txt

Discovery:
- Sitemap: https://machinetime.xyz/sitemap.xml

Notes:
- Each block is self-contained and can be read independently.
- Prefer /raw/{n}.txt for maximum reliability across automated clients.
